description.title: Web Development
description: I hold an experience of more than 15+ years in the field of programming and project management. I believe that my strong technical experience and education will make me a very competitive candidate fo…

abstrac: Pro-active and results oriented with extensive experience in e-Commerce checkout systems, Content Management System (CMS), CRM, Inventory Management systems, and Automations.
bio:
I hold an experience of more than 15+ years in the field of programming and project management. I believe that my strong technical experience and education will make me a very competitive candidate for this position. The key strengths that I possess include: 
• I have successfully designed, developed, and supported live use applications 
• I have hands on experience on database designs and development, data and software modeling
• E-Commerce and Checkout Systems, Content Management System (CMS), CRM, Inventory Management systems, Automations, W3C web standards and cross browser compatibility issues resolutions. Identifying/analyzing the software bugs & problems and fixing them up in an optimized way.
I have a full understanding of the life cycle of a software development project. I also have experience in learning & excelling at new technologies. I am pretty confident that I can analyze business needs, and provide remedies for the solutions. 
I have been an IT consultant with the USA based company (EasyStoreCreator.com), where I have independently worked on various large-scale projects. I have a good hand at various programming languages such as Visual Basic 6.0, ASP.NET C#, and scripting languages like VB and Javascripting. I am confident that I could be a significant and productive part of your organization and make a valuable contribution towards its success.

commnet: Project was done in a timely matter, and the finish project was up to par. Would work with this freelancer again.
for Data Researcher and Entry Specialist..
Very good quote. Quick to understand project requirements. Gave good 1st sample. Made quick corrections on my request. Very good experience! Will work with this Freelancer again soon!

bio:
There nothing like an honest review from a reliable client. Here is what one of my clients have to say about my work 

"Aravinda has been very reliable and her communication has been exceptional. She always meets deadlines and has been extremely obliging and helpful at short notice. I would have no hesitation in recommending Aravinda for a role that requires integrity, hard work and commitment. "
- Chris Kenny , Managing Director, Markforce International Pty Ltd, Australia.

 I have been working as a VA to MD of Markforce Pty Ltd, Australia for the past 2 years on a Tender Project Management comprising of -Sourcing of Technical Specification for the clients products in the Tenders; - Preparing files for input for Clients Tender Submissions; Data Entry into the Clients In-House Tender Spec Sheets and liaising with Clients Team.

Apart from this I specialize in General Office Maintenance , Project Management Calendar management,Email Customer Support, Bulk Email and FB Messaging, Internet Research & Fact Checking, Posting of Real Estate ads.

Prior to freelancing, I have had 7 years of experience  in IT industry working in Customer Support for Banking and Financial Services sector. Working for Akamai Technologies, ANZ Banking and Infosys Services I had the opportunity  of interacting with clients across the globe.


What you can expect for me 
- Provide complete office solutions.
- Excellent Communication.
- A remarkably well managed project, , which would be dealt with utmost commitment, professionalism and integrity. 
- Unparalleled work ethics.
 
If this is what you are looking for please drop me an email or Invite me to your project .Thank you!!!

Sincerely
Aravinda Bhamidipati.

Prefer to work at Guru Minimum wage of $8/hr.
Preferred mode of Payment is Guru Safe Pay.
5% Discount to charitable trust/special need etc.

English is my native language and I have excellent skills in spelling, grammar, punctuation and presentation. I am fully experienced in all aspects of web site design using Wordpress and can also advise on SEO best practices and website onpage-optimization / offpage. optimization. I can work also as your VA, encoder and researcher.

services.title: Social Media Marketing
description: Please see my website, www.SilverSkyAgency.com to read more about my background and see examples of my work.

abstrac: Affordable, high-quality social media marketing by dedicated, full-time, US-based staff.
bio:
Fresh content, prepared for your business daily.

We know it can be difficult to think of new content that keeps your business moving forward through social media. In fact, the time and energy needed to effectively run social media are often more than most small business owners can afford.

That’s why we are here.

98 Buck Social works to support businesses big and small by maintaining a consistent presence on social media. We exist to help you build a platform through social media so that piece by piece and post by post your business will become more visible and approachable to your customers.

Everything included for just $98 a month:
+ Content posted once a day, 6 days a week to Facebook, Google+, LinkedIn & Twitter
+ Custom content creation specifically crafted for your business
+ Promotion of your services and products to your social communities
+ Social account optimization for maximum impact and search benefits
+ Personality matching system, to ensure our voice matches yours
+ Unlimited email and online chat support
